text: [Music]
the son of the soap seller once upon a
time there lived a young man named Ahmed
in the beautiful city of machete machete
beautiful mosque with the golden dome
was the glory of the kingdom of Persia
trade in the city was at its peak people
were happy but not Ahmed as his father's
soap business was dry and breathing out
Oh brothers by my pure soap there is
none better in the city as everyone
knows but the people in Persia did not
use much soap of themselves or their
clothes as sand was used for everything
even cleaning cooking pots and pens and
so there were many days when Ahmed and
his father did not sell enough to buy
sufficient bread for themselves days
passed and soon Ahmed realized that it
was time he stepped out of his father's
soap business and tried something else
father our soaps do not sell and hence I
have decided to go to the market and
look for more opportunities at the
market Ahmed would work hard for traders
peddlers and shopkeepers and in return
get a handful of rice or bread or a few
dried fruits which you would bring back
home and eat with his father now it so
happened one day that ovid as usual was
passing through a jungle to reach the
market and as the Sun was very hot he
thought of stopping by the lake to drink
some water there some of the women were
filling their water jugs while the
others washed clothes just then Ahmed
saw a procession led by a royal minister
the procession stopped just opposite to
Hamid and from the palanquin there
alighted a beautiful lady she was
princess Roxana I am thirsty can I have
some water to drink a lady walked up to
her with a water jug and as she was
about to give it to the princess
suddenly from the bushes sprang a lion
roaring furiously as people ran the lion
turns towards the princess it sprang
upon her and bore her to the ground
seeing the princess in danger Hamid
immediately picked a fire torch lying
nearby and spread with the lion Hamid
swung the torch with all his force and
the lion immediately ran away Thomas
smiled and turned towards princess
Roxana who was shaking with fear he
immediately gave her water to drink
thank you o brave man you saved my life
princess Roxana we need to leave
immediately
princess Roxana nodded and smiling at
ahmud got inside her palanquin she is so
beautiful
the next day when Ovid was in the market
an old peddler walked up to him said you
work very hard do you even make enough
for yourself ah no sir I don't but at
least my father and I get some food to
it why don't you go to the capital city
trade is much better there and someone
like you could earn handsomely
ahmud thought about it for a while and
then said well then that is what I will
do tomorrow
my father and I will set out for the
capital city
the peddler wished him luck and left and
so the next day ahmud and his father
began their journey they would travel
during the night and rest during the day
to avoid the scorching heat of the Sun
they went on sometimes climbing up
winding paths among the mountains at
other times traversing the desert foot
thorn one day when omits father was
sleeping under a tree hamid heard the
sound of someone groaning intrigued he
left his sleeping father behind and
walked towards the direction of the
sound soon he found a poor dervish lying
on the scent he had a scarf thrown over
his shoulders by his side lay a big
stick studded with an eagle head shaped
marble over the shake of the angels give
me a drink of water
hamid immediately gave him his picture
though the water was somewhat salty the
Dervish gulped all of the water down in
an instant thank you so much young lad I
am the old man of the desert and I am
grateful to you for your help here
take this tiny crystal cap each morning
when you rise please a drop of pure
water in the cup and look intently
therein and should any danger threaten
you or those near and dear to you it
will clearly for tell you everything
at that moment a cold breeze blew
turning the old man of the deserts body
into hundreds of rose petals that flew
away with the wind Ahmed was spellbound
he returned to his father and told him
everything from the next morning Amma
did as the Dervish had directed him but
saw nothing for days time passed and now
Amon and his father were only three days
away from the capital city when suddenly
aligned with the scarred it sprang
towards on it help help somebody save my
boy suddenly a beautiful young woman
appeared carrying a fire torch it was
princess Roxana she spun the fire torch
near the lion and it immediately fled
from there princess
you huh well that makes us even
um thank you but what is the princess
doing here
princess Roxana pointed towards the
Royal Caravan my father the king and I
are returning from a pilgrimage when I
happened to hear someone screaming where
are you traveling to to the capital city
well we are going to the capital - you
can come with us thank you so much and
so our Madonna's father joined the Royal
Caravan and soon reached the capital
city seeing the condition of Ahmed's
father
the princess advised him to stay in the
Royal guest chambers for a week before
finding work in the new city
King Joo insisted yes stay in the guest
chambers til you find a job ahmud agreed
happily as he had enough time to find
himself a good job but after his narrow
escape from the lion
he took pains every morning to place a
drop of water in the crystal cup and
look therein
nothing appeared until on the seventh
day he saw in the water a vision of the
king asleep and standing by him a figure
with an uplifted dagger about to strike
he at once hurried to the king my king
there is a great danger upon you someone
is trying to kill you you must be wary
my guards are well-trained and reliable
do not worry
as you say Your Majesty saying this I'm
at left the courtroom that kept thinking
as to who might be wanting to kill the
king
a little away from the capital the lion
turned into an evil looking man he was
the old man of the mountains and unlike
the old man of the desert was a very
evil man he wanted to kill the king and
the princess and seize the capital city
he also wanted to kill honored for he
had saved princess Roxana tonight will
be your last night King meanwhile Armand
was determined to keep a watch darkness
came and the palace was silent the guard
slept but not ahmud he kept waiting when
suddenly he perceived a dark shadow
creeping into that part of the palace
where the king slept the figure
noiselessly made its way to the very
threshold of the King's room when Amon
sprang upon it and at the same time
leaned his lungs out attack attack the
king is being attacked
at this the king woke up and so did the
guards and the soldiers they immediately
came running along with princess Roxana
but just them the old man of the
mountain changed himself into a lion you
have troubled me enough boy I will take
care of the King later but first let me
take care of you the lion sprang towards
Ahmed when suddenly the crystal cup fell
from his pocket and summit came out at
once the Lions body turned into dust and
blew out through the windows the king
the princess and the guards looked in
awe the desert eagle turned towards
Hamid and smiled and then disappeared
into thin air
overwhelmed from the situation the King
turned towards Ahmed and said you are a
brave man Ahmed I announced that from
today you are the prime minister of the
kingdom Ahmed was ecstatic and bowed
down in front of the king
thank you your majesty and so ahmud
became the prime minister of the kingdom
food was no longer scarce and Ovid and
his father lived very happily princess
Roxana was delighted for she secretly
was fond of on it and the thought of him
to never have to leave the palace made
her happier the two soon started to
spend a lot of time together and fell in
love with each other
when princess Roxana told her feelings
to her father he was very happy well I
am very fond of Ahmed and I am very
happy to welcome him into the family but
that is if he wants to marry you too
Ahmed was called to the courtroom
Ahmed my daughter says that she is in
love with you and wants to spend the
rest of her life with you
what are your thoughts Your Majesty I am
in love with her - very well then let me
speak with your father and plan the
wedding let the festivities begin a
grand wedding was held
Ahmed and Princess Roxana were married
the king was happy and so is Ovid's
father vomits journey taught us that no
matter who you are and what you do
kindness is a gift everyone can afford
to give
you
